description: Dart class defining a Note entity with methods for serialization, copying, and creation from a map, used for database interactions.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Immutable data model for a note, including fields for id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, with utility methods for mapping and copying.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a map typically retrieved from a database.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a map suitable for database insert/update operations.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note with optional modified fields.
